---
title: "Checklists — قوائم التحقق"
---

## Discovery
- [ ] Map resources & seasonality
- [ ] Engage stakeholders; define roles & commitments
- [ ] Select priority industries (self-sufficiency vs export)

## Design
- [ ] Masterplan & utilities
- [ ] Factory shortlist with mass-balance
- [ ] Shared resources capacity & SLAs

## Financing
- [ ] CAPEX/OPEX model
- [ ] Funding sources (public, concessional, PPP)
- [ ] Risk allocation

## Build
- [ ] Procurement plan & RFPs
- [ ] Construction schedule & QA plan
- [ ] HSE plan & permits

## Commission
- [ ] SOPs validated
- [ ] Staff trained & certified
- [ ] Performance tests passed

## Operate
- [ ] KPI dashboard live
- [ ] Maintenance program active
- [ ] Community feedback loop
